text: Ekhanakara samaye allah tomadera bojha halka karechena, kenana tini janena ye tomadera madhye durbalata ache. Sejan'ya yadi tomadera madhye ekasata jana dhairyasila thake tabe tara duâ€™sa janake parajita karabe, ara yadi tomadera madhye ekahajara jana thake tabe tara allahâ€Œra anumatikrame du'ihajarake parajita karabe. Ara allah dhairyasiladera sathe rayechena.
